item.title: ‘Call My Agent!’ Star Camille Cottin on Playing a ‘Real Monster of Literature’ in Fred Cavayé’s Upcoming ‘Les Misérables’ Adaptation: ‘I’m Stressed, but Why Not?’
item.description: “Call My Agent!” breakout Camille Cottin readies for an entirely new challenge in the upcoming adaptation of “Les Misérables.” Directed by Fred Cavayé, it takes on Victor Hugo’s best-known novel
